workspaceInstructions: This is a SvelteKit + Supabase project. Follow the patterns established in the codebase and refer to CLAUDE.md for project structure and conventions.
rules: Always use TypeScript for new files
Use existing UI components from src/lib/components/ui/ before creating new ones
Maintain consistent authentication patterns using Supabase
Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling
Follow the established form action patterns for server-side operations
Test authentication flows after making changes to auth routes
